summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 9, First Subdivision of Washington Park Addition, being the alley between 36th Avenue North and 37th Avenue North, from East Madison Street to East Prospect Street; all in accordance with Resolution No. 13040 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
